description: Try our easy to follow Quick Chocolate Self-Saucing Puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quick Chocolate Self-Saucing Puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease 8 x 11/4 cup capacity ramekins or ovenproof dishes.
Put dishes into a large roasting pan.
Whisk melted butter, sugar and eggs in a large bowl. Sift flour and half the cocoa over the mixture. Add milk and whisk until smooth.
Place remaining cocoa and extra sugar in a bowl. Slowly add 2 cups of boiling water, stirring constantly until well combined.
Pour cocoa mixture gently over each pudding.
Pour enough boiling water into roasting pan until water comes half way up the sides of pudding dishes.
Bake for 30 minutes or until puddings are cooked when tested in the centre with a skewer.
Sprinkle with icing sugar and serve with thick cream.
